irobots.behaviour

Class FollowLineBehavior

  • java.lang.Object
    • irobots.behaviour.FollowLineBehavior
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    lejos.robotics.subsumption.Behavior

    public class FollowLineBehavior
extends java.lang.Object
implements lejos.robotics.subsumption.Behavior
    This behavior can be used to make the robot follow a black line on the ground.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FollowLineBehavior(boolean alwaysFollow)
      Create a new instance of this behavior.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void action()
      When the behavior is activated the robot will follow the line by turning to the right when the line is to the right and turning to the left when the line is to the left.
      void suppress()
      Suppresses this behavior.
      boolean takeControl()
      Depending in what activation mode this behavior is it always takes control or only when the line is detected by the color sensor.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • FollowLineBehavior

        public FollowLineBehavior(boolean alwaysFollow)
        Create a new instance of this behavior.

        There are two possible modes to activate this behavior. In the first mode the robot always searches for the line, so this behavior always becomes active if it is bot supressed. When the line is not in reach of the robot it will continue to circle around as long as a higher priority behavior takes over.

        In the second mode the behavior only becomes active if the line is detected. This can be used to have other lower priority behaviors which are active as long as the line is not detected, e.g. for locating the line. Then this behavior takes over once the robot reaches the line.

        Parameters:
        alwaysFollow - Whether this behavior should always be active or if lower priorty behaviors should be possible and the line following should only start when the line is detected.

    • Method Detail

      • takeControl

        public boolean takeControl()
        Depending in what activation mode this behavior is it always takes control or only when the line is detected by the color sensor.
        Specified by:
        takeControl in interface lejos.robotics.subsumption.Behavior

      • action

        public void action()
        When the behavior is activated the robot will follow the line by turning to the right when the line is to the right and turning to the left when the line is to the left. This makes to robot move along the line.
        Specified by:
        action in interface lejos.robotics.subsumption.Behavior

      • suppress

        public void suppress()
        Suppresses this behavior.
        Specified by:
        suppress in interface lejos.robotics.subsumption.Behavior
